data.eml:eml: Veraphis yoshitomii sp. n. (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae) from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2014): Veraphis yoshitomii sp. n. (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae) from Japan. Zootaxa 3860 (6): 589-595, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.6.7
